name: log_summarizer
title: Run log summarizer
short_description: Reads engine logs and agent outboxes to produce human-friendly run summaries in memory.
workflow_description: Collect recent log lines and message highlights, extract anomalies or wins, and write a digest entry to memory.
instructions: Pull recent engine logs and readable outboxes. Produce a concise digest noting successes, errors, and follow-ups. Keep tone factual and avoid modifying other files.
